mapper.sql: client_employee_name, client_employee_pk, nick_name, sales, sales_name, delete_flg, relation_level, back_level, market_level, month_order_count, year_order_count, last_confirm_date, last_order_period, receivable, last_receivable_period, connect_date, type, extra_info
mapper.select:
select
from client_relation

SELECT COUNT(IF(A.relation_level!='新增级',1,NULL)) AS all_all, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='主力级',1,NULL)) AS main_all, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='市场级',1,NULL)) AS market_all, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='尝试级',1,NULL)) AS try_all, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='忽略级',1,NULL)) AS ignore_all, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='新增级',1,NULL)) AS new_all,
COUNT(IF(A.market_level='电话级' and A.relation_level!='新增级',1,NULL)) AS all_tel, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='主力级' and A.market_level='电话级',1,NULL)) AS main_tel, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='市场级' and A.market_level='电话级',1,NULL)) AS market_tel, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='尝试级' and A.market_level='电话级',1,NULL)) AS try_tel, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='忽略级' and A.market_level='电话级',1,NULL)) AS ignore_tel, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='新增级' and A.market_level='电话级',1,NULL)) AS new_tel,
COUNT(IF(A.market_level='微信级' and A.relation_level!='新增级',1,NULL)) AS all_wechat, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='主力级' and A.market_level='微信级',1,NULL)) AS main_wechat, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='市场级' and A.market_level='微信级',1,NULL)) AS market_wechat, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='尝试级' and A.market_level='微信级',1,NULL)) AS try_wechat, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='忽略级' and A.market_level='微信级',1,NULL)) AS ignore_wechat, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='新增级' and A.market_level='微信级',1,NULL)) AS new_wechat,
COUNT(IF(A.market_level='广告级' and A.relation_level!='新增级',1,NULL)) AS all_ad, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='主力级' and A.market_level='广告级',1,NULL)) AS main_ad, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='市场级' and A.market_level='广告级',1,NULL)) AS market_ad, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='尝试级' and A.market_level='广告级',1,NULL)) AS try_ad, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='忽略级' and A.market_level='广告级',1,NULL)) AS ignore_ad, COUNT(IF(A.relation_level='新增级' and A.market_level='广告级',1,NULL)) AS new_ad
FROM client_employee A LEFT JOIN view_client_employee_user B ON A.pk = B.employee_pk
and (B.user_pks like CONCAT('%',#{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and A.public_flg='N' and A.delete_flg='N'

select SUM(A.month_order_count) AS all_order, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='主力级',A.month_order_count,NULL)) AS main_order, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='市场级',A.month_order_count,NULL)) AS market_order, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='尝试级',A.month_order_count,NULL)) AS try_order, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='忽略级',A.month_order_count,NULL)) AS ignore_order, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='新增级',A.month_order_count,NULL)) AS new_order from month_order_count A LEFT JOIN view_client_employee_user B ON A.client_employee_pk = B.employee_pk
and (B.user_pks like CONCAT('%',#{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and A.month = LEFT(now(),7)

select SUM(A.visit_count) AS all_accurate, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='主力级',A.visit_count,NULL)) AS main_accurate, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='市场级',A.visit_count,NULL)) AS market_accurate, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='尝试级',A.visit_count,NULL)) AS try_accurate, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='忽略级',A.visit_count,NULL)) AS ignore_accurate, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='新增级',A.visit_count,NULL)) AS new_accurate from view_visit_count A LEFT JOIN view_client_employee_user B ON A.client_employee_pk = B.employee_pk
and (B.user_pks like CONCAT('%',#{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and LEFT(A.visit_date,7)= LEFT(now(),7)

select SUM(A.wechat_count) AS all_wechat_count, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='主力级',A.wechat_count,NULL)) AS main_wechat_count, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='市场级',A.wechat_count,NULL)) AS market_wechat_count, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='尝试级',A.wechat_count,NULL)) AS try_wechat_count, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='忽略级',A.wechat_count,NULL)) AS ignore_wechat_count, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='新增级',A.wechat_count,NULL)) AS new_wechat_count,
SUM(A.tel_count) AS all_tel_count, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='主力级',A.tel_count,NULL)) AS main_tel_count, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='市场级',A.tel_count,NULL)) AS market_tel_count, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='尝试级',A.tel_count,NULL)) AS try_tel_count, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='忽略级',A.tel_count,NULL)) AS ignore_tel_count, SUM(IF(A.relation_level='新增级',A.tel_count,NULL)) AS new_tel_count from view_incoming_count A LEFT JOIN view_client_employee_user B ON A.client_employee_pk = B.employee_pk
and (B.user_pks like CONCAT('%',#{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and LEFT(A.incoming_date,7)= LEFT(now(),7)

select SUM(A.score) AS score, SUM(A.month_score) AS month_score, SUM(B.receivable) AS receivable, SUM(B.warning) AS warning, SUM(C.sum_reimbursement) AS sum_reimbursement, SUM(D.sum_reimbursement) AS month_reimbursement from view_score A LEFT JOIN view_receivable_meter B ON A.user_pk = B.user_pk LEFT JOIN view_sum_reimbursement C ON A.user_number = C.apply_user LEFT JOIN view_month_reimbursement D ON A.user_number = D.apply_user
and A.user_pk = #{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(*) from client_employee
and (sales_name like CONCAT('%',#{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and delete_flg='N'

select A.pk, A.client_employee_name, A.client_employee_pk, A.nick_name, A.sales, A.sales_name, A.delete_flg, A.relation_level, A.back_level, A.market_level, A.month_order_count, A.year_order_count, A.last_confirm_date, A.last_order_period, A.receivable, A.last_receivable_period, A.connect_date, A.type, A.extra_info, A.head_photo, B.comment from client_relation A LEFT JOIN client_employee B ON A.client_employee_pk = B.pk
and (A.sales like CONCAT('%',#{params.bo.sales,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and (A.sales_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.bo.sales_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and (A.client_employee_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.bo.client_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and A.relation_level = #{params.bo.relation_level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and A.relation_level !='新增级'
and A.delete_flg='N' and not ((A.sales is null OR A.sales='public') and (A.receivable is null OR A.receivable =0))
ORDER BY last_receivable_period DESC
ORDER BY connect_date ASC
ORDER BY last_order_period DESC
ORDER BY year_order_count DESC

select A.pk, A.client_employee_name, A.client_employee_pk, A.nick_name, A.sales, A.sales_name, A.delete_flg, A.relation_level, A.back_level, A.market_level, A.month_order_count, A.year_order_count, A.last_confirm_date, A.last_order_period, A.receivable, A.last_receivable_period, A.connect_date, A.type, A.extra_info, A.head_photo, B.comment from client_relation A LEFT JOIN client_employee B ON A.client_employee_pk = B.pk WHERE A.client_employee_pk = #{employee_pk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select sum(A.point) AS point, A.create_user AS user_number, A.date, B.pk AS user_pk from view_point A LEFT JOIN user_base B ON A.create_user = B.user_number
and B.pk = #{user_pk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and LEFT(date,7)='2018-12'
GROUP BY A.create_user,A.date

select A.team_number, A.user_number, A.confirm_date, B.pk AS user_pk, A.product_point from view_enable_back_point A LEFT JOIN user_base B ON A.user_number = B.user_number
and B.pk = #{user_pk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
